summary:
Just a little retexture of the great work that TheGreenLion did. Now the chainmail is see-through

Please read the long description and enorse UNP Creator dimon99 and exeter for the mesh. And of course TheGreenLion for his nice work :-)
descriptionHtml:
I saw a picture that someone posted as a comment to a UNP Model with transparent chainmail on ancient nord armor. I didn´t find the texture, so I made it myself. I created the transparent Chainmail texture with gimp and paint shop pro by repeating one chainring of a picture from the internet.
I hope its ok not asking anyone for permission, because I dunno how to write a personal note to someone.

If you want the gauntlet and the boots like in the screenshot, you need the original files from TheGreenLion

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2859&navtag=file/images.php?id=5941&tab=3

Then you replace the one texture with mine.

To really see something through, you need of course the mesh

The UNP Version needs 

The Armor Set 2 from exeter
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7305


I also tried it with CHSBHC BBP jiggely-giggely-mesh and it worked :-)

There you need the mesh from nimbonius

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7475&navtag=file/images.php?id=7475&tab=3

update: 
I added the matching boots and a picture of a possible skimpier version. I´m not shure if this is too much ... 

update2:
I added a picture that shows the texture on the CHSBHC mesh by nimbonius

update2:
I just uploaded the skimpier version. I hope you like it.
author: PanTast
